channel.title: What would you do if all of the rpg
channel.description:
:eek: what would you do if all of the rpg games like "mopar" and "runescape" went down for 1 year? :eek:
:eek: i would ummm sit in the middle of the road for 1 year lol... :eek:

item.title: What would you do if all of the rpg
item.dc:creator: @itachi_uchia itachi uchia
item.description:
@itachi_uchia wrote:

I’d get active.
Im not a no-lifer.

Play with some friends,skate,football.
study,everything.

LIFE.

Read full topic

item.title: What would you do if all of the rpg
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“ilyaostr9, post:8, topic:50054”][quote author=ownage? link=topic=70274.msg800970#msg800970 date=1169392118]
:eek: what would you do if all of the rpg games like “mopar” and “runescape” went down for 1 year? :eek:

:eek: i would ummm sit in the middle of the road for 1 year lol… :eek:
[/quote]

:eek: what would you do if all of the rpg games like “mopar” and “runescape” went down for 1 year? :eek:

:eek: i would ummm sit in the middle of the road for 1 year lol… :eek:

I’d do what he would doing.

That just proves the sad, sad RuneScape/MoparScape addicts.

I think I just totally died on the inside. :’([/quote]

Have you heard of sarcasm before? Or maybe a joke?

Read full topic
